titleStmt.title: A complete Christian dictionary wherein the significations and several acceptations of all the words mentioned in the Holy Scriptures of the Old and New Testament are fully opened, expressed, explained ... / begun by ... Mr. Thomas Wilson, minister of the word at St. Georges in Canterbury ... ; continued by Mr. John Bagwell... ; augmented and enlarged with a sixfold addition ... extracted out of the most approved authors, both ancient and modern, especially Petri Ravanelli Bibliotheca sacra.
titleStmt.author: Wilson, Thomas, 1563-1622.
Bagwell, John.
Ravanellus, Petrus. Bibliotheca sacra.
Symson, Andrew, 1638-1712.

editionStmt.edition: And now in this seventh edition very much englarged and digested into one complete alphabetical dictionary /

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. Cotes and are to be sold by Thomas Williams,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
